variable.name: RW_WOR17
variable.description: Now I am going to spell a word forward and I want you to spell it backwards. The word is world. W-O-R-L-D. Please spell it in reverse order.
variable.value: Not administered for reason unrelated to cognitive status
Unknown or did not take the test
